on May 2010 Disney channel Romania was removed from [[Hot Bird]] satellite .Advertising is shown in Romanian and Bulgarian; the voices in the ads are only heard on the respective audio tracks. At the commercial break ident it shows just the Romanian word for "commercials":"RECLAME", unlike on the Central Europe version of Disney Channel, where it shows first:"REKLAMA", then"REKLÃM". â
On June 1, 2011, the new [[Disney Channel]] logo will be launched. In the same day, Disney Channel Romania stops broadcasting [[Playhouse Disney]]. Then there will be national changes on Disney Channel: the name of the channel will be just "Disney" and all of the series from Playhouse Disney wil be moved to the new channel that will be launched in the same day: Disney Junior. The first commercial announcing that Playhouse Disney will be re-branded to Disney Junior aired on April 8, 2011 (the commercial can be watched on Disney Channel from 6:50am till 8:50 and from 15:15 till 16:10, when the channel is airing the Playhouse Disney block.
